content: description bring a little bit of warmth to your winter wardrobe and wrap up in these cozy warm hues the ripple stitch gives it beautiful texture along with the color changing yarn the fun and easy stitch repeat creates a satisfying piece this pattern is free on my blog 1 this pattern is available as a kit with lion brand 2 it comes with all the yarn you need to make your wrap + the digital pdf download you can even customize your yarn color this pattern is a free video tutorial 3 on my youtube channel 1 https //www eandpcrochet com/coastal-shores-wrap-crochet-pattern/ 2 http //shrsl com/3doie 3 https //youtu be/0vzwhzitheo
